alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 6:52AM AKST until November 21 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT SOUTH AND WEST OF WASILLA... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley south and west of Wasilla. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect periods of light freezing rain to develop in the afternoon to evening hours with the mostly likely areas of ice accumulation from Meadow Lakes southward to Pt. Mackenzie.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
